fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Stand Guard (Night): Protect a player, granting Powerful defense, and attacking one random visitor.
Targeted Strike (Night): Protect a player, granting Powerful defense. You may select a subalignment type or player, or both (or several of both) to specifically attempt to attack. 2 uses.
For The Unseen God! (Day): Attack one random voter of the Mastermind. If the Mastermind is dead, this will target the Assassin instead. 1 use.
